meta.article_title: June 6, 2022 - What Are Your Strongest and Weakest Links?

strongest_and_weakest_links.probleme: Identifying strengths and weaknesses in table tennis

debutant.technique: Watch a video of yourself playing and count how you win or lose points

exercices_complementaires.description: Compile data on winning and losing points to identify strengths and weaknesses

metriques_progression.target: Maximize winning ways and minimize losing ones

erreurs_a_eviter.pitfall: Winging it without understanding strengths and weaknesses
